name: Spiced Chutney Of Cranberry and Pineapple
recipeIngredient: 1/2 fresh pineapple, peeled, cored and diced
Juice and grated rind of 1 orange

recipeInstructions.text: Put all the ingredients in a heavy saucepan and stir to combine. Bring to a boil and cook over medium heat about 20 minutes, until the mixture is thick.

Transfer to sterilized canning jars and seal according to manufacturer's directions, or put in plastic containers and refrigerate. The chutney can be prepared several days in advance. Serve at room temperature.
